text:
We want our kids to maximize learning and enjoy it as well, but we never truly know how they are doing!

LearnLeap is a dashboard app that gives you an all-in-one view of your child's learning!

Let me know your thoughts!

cc: @_buildspace @_nightsweekends @FarzaTV https://t.co/ZVzbntewjL
